jobDescription: Job CategoryProducts and Technology  Job Details  The Infrastructure Data Science team is looking for a data scientist to contribute to our growing efforts in developing impactful data science applications that support infrastructure operations and strategy. In this role, he/she will be exposed to the entire data science stack, from distributed storage systems to operationalized internal applications. As we scale, our team continuously invests in the data science workflow by expanding our data catalog, automating data pipelines, performing data validation, and deploying models. Responsibilities:Partner with stakeholders to support infrastructure data analyses.Acquire, clean, and structure data from multiple sources.Perform statistical analyses and modeling to understand the data.Map data flows and develop data integration roadmaps.Contribute to algorithmic development for infrastructure anomaly detection and forecasting.Required Skills/ Experience:Working towards Masters degree / PhD in Data Science, Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, or relevant Engineering fieldProficiency with many of the following: Python, R, SQL, Hive, Hadoop, Jupyter Notebook, visualization librariesSelf-starter and high degree of motivation to go above and beyond the task at hand.Excellent written and spoken communication skills.Ability to effectively drive complex data projects with many dependencies. Are you an upcoming or recent graduate (within the past 2.5 years)? Please check out our FutureForce program at www.salesforce.com/futureforce. We appreciate your interest but we are seeking industry experienced engineers.
